channel.title: Comments on: Knowing SQL Server and where it lives â€“ T-SQL Tuesday #028
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Mike Fal
item.dc:creator: Mike Fal
item.description: Great post Ted. This is what I wanted to say in my T-SQL Tuesday blog, but you word it much better. I guess I skipped over the "building a good base" because I feel that most of us, as our route tends to be accidentally falling in to DBAness, build up that base as a matter of simply being tossed into the fire. Thanks for putting focus on that, but also emphasizing the need for specialization to further your career.
item.content:encoded: Great post Ted. This is what I wanted to say in my T-SQL Tuesday blog, but you word it much better. I guess I skipped over the “building a good base” because I feel that most of us, as our route tends to be accidentally falling in to DBAness, build up that base as a matter of simply being tossed into the fire. Thanks for putting focus on that, but also emphasizing the need for specialization to further your career.
